definitions: the quality of having a level surface without raised areas or indentations

examples.text: the flatness of the external surface
make sure that the paper is of uniform flatness

definitions: lack of hills in a landscape

examples.text: the flatness of the desert stretched out uninterrupted for miles

definitions: lack of emotion or enthusiasm; dullness

examples.text: neither the editing nor the score do much to help the film's emotional flatness
there's no escaping the flatness of the characters

definitions: lack of activity of trade, prices, etc.; sluggishness

examples.text: investors seem content with progress, despite the flatness of revenue and profits

shortDefinitions: lack of activity of trade, prices, etc.

definitions: loss of effervescence in a sparkling drink.
shortDefinitions: loss of effervescence in sparkling drink

definitions: loss of air in something inflated, such as a tire.
shortDefinitions: loss of air in something inflated such as tyre

definitions: the condition of a battery having exhausted its charge.
shortDefinitions: condition of battery having exhausted its charge

definitions: the quality of a musical sound being below normal pitch
shortDefinitions: quality of musical sound being below normal pitch
